description: Configuration regarding the detailed view of a user ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me")
title: UserDetailsConfig

description.description: Configuration regarding the "description" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "description" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

displayName.description: Configuration regarding the "displayName" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "displayName" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

distinguishedName.description: Configuration regarding the "distinguishedName" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "distinguishedName" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

givenName.description: Configuration regarding the "givenName" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "givenName" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

jpegPhoto.description: Configuration regarding the "jpegPhoto" attribute of the user. If "showFallback" and "show" are false then nothing will be shown

show.description: Wether or not to show the "jpegPhoto" in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

mail.description: Configuration regarding the "mail" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "mail" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

memberOf.description: Configuration regarding the "memberOf" attribute of the user

shortMemberOf.description: If false the attribute "memberOf" of the user will be shown as the full distinguishedName, else only the CN is shown. @default false

asLinks.description: Show groups as links to each group description

show.description: Wether or not to show the "memberOf" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). If false "shortMemberOf" will be ignored @default true

sAMAccountName.description: Configuration regarding the "sAMAccountName" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "sAMAccountName" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

sn.description: Configuration regarding the "sn" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "sn" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

userAccountControl.description: Configuration regarding the "userAccountControl" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "userAccountControl" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

whenChanged.description: Configuration regarding the "whenChanged" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "whenChanged" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true

whenCreated.description: Configuration regarding the "whenCreated" attribute of the user

show.description: Wether or not to show the "whenCreated" attribute in the detail pages ("/users/[dn]" or "/users/me"). @default true
